name: 3 Minutes Deep
description:
Careful! A nuclear bomb is about to hit in 3 minutes! Quickly dig down and find as many supplies as you can on your way down. You might even stumble across some junk that you can sell and buy upgrades at the underground shops.

(Made by 7Seven Studios for LD48 in under 72 hours. All art, music, sfx, and programming were made within the timespan.)
